dublinCore.dc:title: 119 HR 2454 IH: No Citizenship for Alien Invaders Act of 2025
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Mills (for himself, Mrs. Luna, Mr. Brecheen, and Mr. Harris of Maryland) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on the Judiciary

form.official-title: To amend the Immigration and Nationality Act to preclude the naturalization of any person who has unlawfully entered the United States.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the No Citizenship for Alien Invaders Act of 2025.

Section 312 of the Immigration and Nationality Act (8 U.S.C. 1423) is amended by adding at the end the following: No alien who enters the United States unlawfully shall be eligible for naturalization, notwithstanding any other provision of the immigration laws..
